text.div:
Concept Translation

Operation: translate

Translate a code from one value set to another, based on the existing value set and concept maps resources, and/or other additional knowledge available to the server. || One (and only one) of the in parameters (code, coding, codeableConcept) must be provided, to identify the code that is to be translated. || The outcome is an operationOutcome with hints, warnings, or errors, or the translated code in an extension

URL: [base]/ConceptMap/$translate

Parameters

NameUseCardinalityTypeDocumentation
codein0..1code

The code that is to be translated. If a code is provided, a system must be provided

systemin0..1uri

The system for the code that is to be translated

versionin0..1string

The version of the system, if one was provided in the source data

valueSetin0..1Resource(ValueSet)

Identifies the value set used when the concept (system/code pair) was chosen.

codingin0..1Coding

A coding to translate

codeableConceptin0..1CodeableConcept

A full codeableConcept to validate. The server can translate any of the coding values as it chooses

outcomeout1..1OperationOutcome

If the translation is successful, the translation is represented as an extension (uri = http://hl7.org/fhir/Profile/general-extensions#translation) of type Coding on the operation outcome, or else an error must be returned. Hints and warnings may be returned in either case

title: Concept Translation
description: Translate a code from one value set to another, based on the existing value set and concept maps resources, and/or other additional knowledge available to the server. || One (and only one) of the in parameters (code, coding, codeableConcept) must be provided, to identify the code that is to be translated.  || The outcome is an operationOutcome with hints, warnings, or errors, or the translated code in an extension
name: translate

parameter.name: code
parameter.documentation: The code that is to be translated. If a code is provided, a system must be provided

parameter.name: system
parameter.documentation: The system for the code that is to be translated

parameter.name: version
parameter.documentation: The version of the system, if one was provided in the source data

parameter.name: valueSet
parameter.documentation: Identifies the value set used when the concept (system/code pair) was chosen.

parameter.name: codeableConcept
parameter.documentation: A full codeableConcept to validate. The server can translate any of the coding values as it chooses

parameter.name: outcome
parameter.documentation: If the translation is successful, the translation is represented as an extension (uri = [[[http://hl7.org/fhir/Profile/general-extensions#translation]]]) of type Coding on the operation outcome, or else an error must be returned. Hints and warnings may be returned in either case
